useCase.name: Manage Settings
useCase.description: Allow Admin to view and edit settings

mainSequence.step: Admin requests to view settings list
Settings Controller retrieves settings list from Settings Model
Settings Model returns settings list to Settings Controller
Settings Controller sends settings list result to List Settings View
List Settings View displays settings list to Admin
List Settings View sends new settings data
Settings Controller saves settings to Settings Model
Settings Model returns save result to Settings Controller
Settings Controller sends settings list result to List Settings View
List Settings View displays updated settings list to Admin
